# fragmentFunctionDescriptor

**Instance Property**

Assigns a function descriptor representing the function this pipeline executes for each fragment.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var fragmentFunctionDescriptor: MTL4FunctionDescriptor? { get set }
```
